Ultimo stands now as his leg had fixed itself to usable limits.  "Well you got me all wrong, he was never my friend, only a prize.  It does not matter what happens to him, only to you." he said he pumped his gun to reload.  "Flame"

"Online"  

A blast of flame flew at Hellpeon mid section completly ingulfing Hacha, th already dead nebulan in the flame.  


nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>
> Hellpeon growled asa the first ten shots fired by Ultimo stuck him in 
> the abdomen and his gut. However then next 15 struck something... not 
> him... but Hacha. For as the remaining blasts closed in on him he 
> brought the small bot to their direction letting them slam into the 
> small robot...which probably isnt to good for him. Hellpeon then 
> laughs as he moves an arm over some of the holes and then moves them 
> away as they begin to heal themselves.
> 
> Hellpeon: "You got one good shot off on me... but at what cost? YOur 
> little friend here?"
> 
> Hellpeon smirked and held up the beaten for Of Hacha before he 
> blasted the small bot towards Ultimo with a large blast of Chaochitan 
> energy. A moment later he flew at Ulimo himself and tried to Run him 
> through with his sabre.
> 
>
